pr_title: Explain how to add commands to kits

timeline.message: Explain how to add commands to kits

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                  - /ebc {PLAYER} just got some fancy tools!
          
          
            
                  - /broadcast {PLAYER} just got some fancy tools!
timeline.author: mdcfe
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -23,6 +24,7 @@ kits:
       - dshovel 1 digspeed:3 name:Dwarf lore:Diggy|Diggy|Hole
       - lhelm 1 color:255,255,255 name:Top_Hat lore:Good_day,_Good_day
       - daxe:780 1
+      - /ebc {PLAYER} just got some fancy tools!
